content.title: BBC Home - Breaking News, World News, US News, Sports, Business, Innovation, Climate, Culture, Trave...
content.metaDescription: Visit BBC for trusted reporting on the latest world and US news, sports, business, climate, innovation, culture and much more.
content.content:
[## Putin-Trump call a curveball for Zelensky ahead of White House meeting The phone conversation, held while Zelensky was flying to Washington, stole a march on his big moment. 12 hrs agoWorld](/news/articles/cze63r34213o)[## Bolton surrenders to face charges of sharing classified information Donald Trump's former national security adviser is accused of using personal messaging apps and email to illegally share sensitive information. 33 mins agoUS & Canada](/news/articles/cg43lwwdwlno)[LIVE ## Zelensky to make case for long-range missiles at White House meeting with Trump](https://www.bbc.com/news/live/cj6ne4xjg6kt)Ukraine's president is visiting Washington for the third time, days after Trump signalled he may give Kyiv access to Tomahawk long-range missiles.
[## Chinese Communist Party expels top generals in sweeping military crackdown The expulsions include China's second highest ranking military official. 1 hr agoAsia](/news/articles/cwy7528ekzro)[## Baek Se-hee, author of I Want To Die But I Want To Eat Tteokbokki, dies at 35 South Korean writer Baek Se-hee was known for her 2018 bestselling memoir about her struggle with depression. 5 hrs agoAsia](/news/articles/cpq1dy8w3jwo)[## Venezuelan fishermen in fear after US strikes on boats in the Caribbean At least 27 people have been killed in US strikes on alleged "narco-boats" in the Caribbean. 14 hrs agoWorld](/news/articles/c77z48lg2l5o)[LIVE ## Aircraft tracking data shows US flew B-52 bombers near Venezuela Latest updates from the BBC's specialists in fact-checking, verifying video and tackling disinformation.](https://www.bbc.com/news/live/cd7rn04lnl8t)
## Only from the BBC
[## The Icelandic town abandoned to the volcanoes A 2023 volcanic eruption forced 3,700 residents to flee Grindavík. Now, visitors can join guided tours of the ghost town to witness nature's power first hand.](/travel/article/20251015-the-icelandic-town-abandoned-to-the-volcanoes)[## The reason art heists exploded in the 1970s Acclaimed new film The Mastermind, starring Josh O'Connor, tells the story of an art robbery gone wrong. It's inspired by a wave of similar thefts during a decade known for upheaval.](/culture/article/20251016-the-reason-art-heists-exploded-in-the-1970s)[## Arts in Motion](https://www.bbc.com/arts/arts-in-motion)[## Brian Cox on why you should keep your inner child alive Acclaimed actor Brian Cox shares his journey from a challenging childhood to global acting success.See more](https://www.bbc.com/arts/arts-in-motion?id=p0kfrngc)The Global Story[# Why has Trump authorised CIA action in Venezuela?](/audio/play/w3ct714s)Following recent boat strikes, Trump says he is considering strikes on Venezuelan soil26 minsSave[## More news](https://www.bbc.com/news)[LIVE ## Home Office was told last week about potential Maccabi Tel Aviv fan ban, police football unit says Government officials have been meeting today to discuss fans from the Israeli football team being blocked from a game against Aston Villa.](https://www.bbc.com/news/live/cx204j7x4pqt)[## Airline apologises for asking dead flight attendant for paperwork The woman's death has triggered widespread anger in Taiwan following speculation that she was overworked. 4 hrs agoAsia](/news/articles/cy40gq2882xo)[## BBC Gaza documentary a 'serious' breach of rules, Ofcom says The regulator says the documentary, broadcast earlier this year, was "materially misleading". 2 hrs agoCulture](/news/articles/c629j5m2n01o)[## US governor wins $1.4m playing blackjack in Las Vegas Billionaire JB Pritzker won the sum while on holiday with friends and family. 3 hrs agoUS & Canada](/news/articles/c5y0gr4y4r2o)[## Government loses bid to block appeal against Palestine Action ban Palestine Action's co-founder said the government's attempt to avoid judicial scrutiny had 'backfired spectacularly'. 47 mins agoPolitics](/news/articles/ce9dg5v43vmo)[## King to be first British monarch to pray with Pope in at least 500 years The King will become the first British monarch to pray in a church service with a pope since the Reformation. 3 hrs agoEurope](/news/articles/czxkrn7jvexo)[## Apple wins US F1 TV rights in $750m deal Apple wins the rights to broadcast Formula 1 in the United States for the next five years in deal said to be worth about $750m (£558m) in total. 1 hr agoFormula 1](/sport/formula1/articles/c9q1ly83ww5o)[## Must watch](https://www.bbc.com/video)[## How would US Tomahawk missiles change the Ukraine-Russia war? The BBC's Jonathan Beale explains what impact the weapons might have if the US decides to send them to Ukraine. 53 mins agoWorld](/news/videos/c0qpdve4nqqo)[## Grocery bills, Trump and Gaza: How NYC mayoral debate unfolded Zohran Mamdani, Andrew Cuomo and Curtis Sliwa took to the stage for the first mayoral debate in New York City's general election. 12 hrs agoUS & Canada](/news/videos/c2016wzq545o)[## Moment grain silo collapses in Illinois Local officials reported that there were no injuries after a silo filled with soybeans collapsed in Martinton, 80 miles south of Chicago. 20 hrs agoUS & Canada](/news/videos/cwy75we8nnlo)[## Police fire tear gas at protesters in Peru Police fired tear gas at protesters who could be seen sheltering in doorways. 1 day agoLatin America](/news/videos/c993r08kp89o)[## Why is the Grand Sumo Tournament being held in London? Why is the national sport of Japan being held overseas for only the second time in its history? 2 days ago](/sport/videos/c1d05955947o)[## 'I just wanted to give Prince William a big cwtch' A widow who had tea with the Prince of Wales at her home to discuss her husband's suicide says it was "really special". 1 day agoWales](/news/videos/cly422485k0o)[## BBC follows family forced to move four times in a year and live in hotel for months Danielle and her three children have moved four times in a year after her landlord wanted to sell their flat. 1 day agoUK](/news/videos/cvgwx0n3557o)[## Security guard saves woman from being hit by tram Footage released by the Turkish city of Kayseri's transport operator shows the last-minute rescue. 2 days agoWorld](/news/videos/c93dpeep09lo)[## Science & Health](https://www.bbc.com/innovation/science)[## The joys of 'urban geology' If you look closer at the building stones, tiles and pavements of the big city, you can find a hidden world of geology and history, from fascinating fossils to unusual rocks.See more](/future/article/20251017-urban-geology-how-to-find-fossils-and-other-discoveries-in-your-citys-buildings)[## Travel](https://www.bbc.com/travel)[## Pomalo: Croatia's delightful philosophy of slow living In Dubrovnik, "pomalo" isn't just a holiday indulgence. It's a philosophy of life that shapes everything from seaside swims to long lunches.See more](/travel/article/20251015-croatias-delightful-philosophy-of-slow-living)[## US & Canada news](https://www.bbc.com/news/us-canada)[## Five takeaways from NYC mayoral debate as Mamdani and Cuomo clash The three leading candidates for New York City mayor have been making their case to lead America's biggest city.](/news/articles/cn8xlx53jn6o)[## Ice hockey player Carter Hart to join Golden Knights after sexual assault acquittal](/news/articles/cjek0zgjdd5o)[## Former Trump adviser John Bolton criminally indicted](/news/articles/cgql2qzkz5zo)[## Weekly quiz: What award did this sleepy spider win a 10-year-old?](/news/articles/cvgvw7103ppo)[## More world news](https://www.bbc.com/news/world)[## Thousands attend state funeral of former Kenyan Prime Minister Odinga Mourners carrying national flags and portraits of the late leader pay their final respects at a city stadium.](/news/articles/cwyp98k9rnpo)[## Madagascar's military leader thanks Gen Z protesters as he is sworn in](/news/articles/cr7mn1n53jno)[## The moment Madagascar's new president was sworn in](/news/videos/c993rljpp9po)[## Ten-year-old Palestinian boy shot dead by Israeli forces in West Bank](/news/articles/ce8g9p0ppe0o)[## Business](https://www.bbc.com/business)[## UK stock market hit by nerves over US banks Problems at two US regional banks have made investors nervous and triggered a sell-off in shares.](/news/articles/c4gjz82wx4wo)[## China has found Trump's pain point - rare earths](/news/articles/ckg1jr18z4ko)[## Why the US needs China's rare earths](/news/articles/c1drqeev36qo)[## China's biggest shopping event starts five weeks early to revive spending](/news/articles/cx24d4xjzj3o)[## Sport](https://www.bbc.com/sport)[## Is the writing already on the wall for Postecoglou at Forest? The potential consequences of defeat this weekend will not be lost on Nottingham Forest head coach Ange Postecoglou, with the club already looking at potential replacements.](/sport/football/articles/czxkr285kgko)[LIVE ## Premier League news conferences and team news: Latest on Palmer, Rodri, Alisson](https://www.bbc.com/sport/football/live/cg51802ee9et)[## I can't bank on three years at Man Utd - Amorim](/sport/football/articles/cz0xmjj0z57o)[## Rousey plays down rumours after training return](/sport/mixed-martial-arts/articles/cwyp9d4rp04o)[## Latest Sport audio](https://www.bbc.com/audio/category/sport)[## The Wayne Rooney Show # Episode 18](/audio/play/p0m7km8b)Save39 mins
[## More Than The Score # Valentin Vacherot on unreal feeling of beating his cousin to make tennis history](/audio/play/p0m95wc9)Save17 mins
[## Rugby League Top 10s # Rugby League Top 10: Men of Steel](/audio/play/p0m8c318)Save41 mins

Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy (L) meets with US President Donald Trump in Washington D.C., United States on August 19, 2025.

A close up crop of an Eva Air flight taking off from Taipei airport in May 2024 against a hazy grey sky, the words 'Eva Air' can be seen on the side of the aircraft.
Police arrest an older man in Trafalgar square for defying the Palestine Action ban, carrying him by his arms and legs. Many people are seen in the background waving placards and Palestinian flags.

Mayoral candidates are debating in the New York City mayoral debate.

Mum Danielle sits on the floor of a hotel room with her three young children. There is a bunk bed in the background.
A woman is pulled to safety by a man from in front of a tram.

Andrew Cuomo, Curtis Sliwa and Zohran Mamdani stand at glass podiums on a stage with red and blue starred background and small stools with water next to them
